briefdescription.para: Check if an interrupt is enabled.

simplesect.para: Returns true if interrupt is enabled, false otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int irq, unsigned int prio, unsigned int flags)
memberdef.name: arm_gic_irq_set_priority

simplesect.para: Returns the ID of an active interrupt

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int sgi_id, uint64_t target_aff, uint16_t target_list)
memberdef.name: gic_raise_sgi

parameterdescription.para: target affinity in mpidr form. Aff level 1 2 3 will be extracted by api.

briefdescription.para: Driver for ARM Generic Interrupt Controller.

detaileddescription.para: The Generic Interrupt Controller (GIC) is the default interrupt controller for the ARM A and R profile cores. This driver is used by the ARM arch implementation to handle interrupts.
